products.title: Zambezi Anthracite Grey Real Wood
products.description: Their premium zambezi painted anthracite grey real wood blind features a dark grey painted finish, great for adding polished simplicity into a room. From soft creamy neutrals to trending greys and stone shades, this real wood range adds a modern sleek finish to your windows. A shade that never goes out of trend, this grey wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously.

A shade that never goes out of trend, this grey wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price. Add a luxury finish with their complimentary slate tape.

products.description: Simple styling with a unique twist, the galaxy anthracite roman blind will enhance a modern living space, bedroom or study. This smart blind will give your space a sleek update with an easy to operate design and cool contemporary colour palette. The grey, woven fabric benefits from a twinkling added touch created by metallic yarns. products.title: Zambezi 25mm Anthracite Grey Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: A bold dark grey shade, this zambezi anthracite perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. Grey shades are not only clean and trend-setting, but can be either complimented with co-ordinating accessories, or can be the background to a more bolder colour palette. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors.

products.title: Galaxy Anthracite Grey Curtain
products.description: Simplicity at its most stylish, the galaxy anthracite grey curtain is sure to make an impact thanks to its distinctive woven texture and subtle tonal variation. The dark grey weave is delicately accented by metallic yarns that will catch the light and glimmer beautifully at your windows. products.title: Anthracite Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: The deep anthracite grey slat is a 'statement neutral', drawing the eye as a key furnishing, while still pairing smartly with all colour schemes. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the most simple shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles. Matching the ral 7016 code, you can be sure this will match your new bifold doors perfectly.

products.title: Lexington Anthracite Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
